description_for_human: Locate public charging stations and Tesla supercharger locations for electric vehicles.
description_for_model: Find public charging stations in the US and Tesla supercharger stations available to both non-Tesla electric vehicles and Tesla EVs for a specific location across the globe. Search by charging station title, provider/vendors, city, state or province, etc. Data response includes station title, address, number of chargers at each location, provider/vendor, connector type and other relevant information, including a permalink to a page that has additional information. Prompts the user to fine tune their request if the results are too broad or too many results.
